summary: The 'Preserving Great Americans’ Legacies Act of 2025' prohibits the Secretary of the Navy from renaming specific naval vessels. The bill focuses on preserving the names of vessels currently named after notable individuals like Cesar Chavez, Medgar Evers, Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and others recognized for their contributions. The legislation cites Title 10, United States Code, and aims to safeguard these historical commemorations.
